subject: Net::Telnet - Variable in Prompt
body:
Hi,

Is there a way to use a variable in the Prompt parameter like the below
line?

 my $telnet = Net::Telnet->new([HOST => "$server",]
                [PROMPT => /$prompt/,]);

Thanks & Regards,
Lakshmi
952-833-1220


--
